articles.title: Handwritten Hotel California lyrics at centre of trial - BBC.com
articles.description: New York prosecutors have accused three men of conspiring to sell stolen drafts of the hit song.
articles.content:
By Brandon DrenonBBC News
Handwritten pages inscribed with the first known iterations of legendary rock song Hotel California will take centre stage at a criminal trial on Wednesday. 
Glenn Horowit… [+2251 chars]
